TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SignerInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: The class represents a signer associated with a object that represents a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

span.span: The class represents a signer associated with a object that represents a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Las firmas representadas por la clase puede realizarse sobre el contenido del mensaje o una firma.The signatures represented by the class can be either over message content or a signature. El último tipo de firma se conoce como un *contrafirma*.The latter kind of signature is referred to as a *countersignature*. Esta implementación de CMS/PKCS #7 sólo admite un nivel de contrafirma.This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. Es decir, se puede firmar una firma, lo que constituye una contrafirma, pero ese contrafirma no se vuelve a estar firmada.That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. Esta clase no tiene un constructor público; por lo tanto, que no puede ser públicamente crean las instancias.This class does not have a public constructor; therefore, it cannot be publicly instantiated. Es una clase de sólo lectura accesible desde la propiedad.It is a read-only class accessible from the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Certificate As X509Certificate2

summary.span: The property retrieves the signing certificate associated with the signer information.

span.span: The property retrieves the signing certificate associated with the signer information.

value.span: Un objeto que representa el certificado de firma.

span.span: An object that represents the signing certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Si el certificado de firma no se incluye en la hora de la firma usando la propiedad y, a continuación, el certificado no se devolverán.If the signing certificate is not included at signing time by using the property, then the certificate will not be returned.

summary.span: The method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information.

span.span: The method verifies the data integrity of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information.

summary.span: does not authenticate the signer information because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature.

span.span: does not authenticate the signer information because this method does not involve verifying a digital signature.

summary.span: For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information and countersignatures, use the or methods.

span.span: For general-purpose checking of the integrity and authenticity of CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information and countersignatures, use the or methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método no proporciona autenticación de la información del firmante de mensaje CMS/PKCS #7.This method does not provide authentication of the CMS/PKCS #7 message signer information.

summary.span: Verifies the digital signature of the message.

span.span: Verifies the digital signature of the message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CheckSignature(bool verifySignatureOnly) cil managed

param.name: verifySignatureOnly
param.span: A bool value that specifies whether only the digital signature is verified.

span.span: A bool value that specifies whether only the digital signature is verified.

param.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , only the signature is verified.

span.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , only the signature is verified.

param.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , the digital signature is verified, the certificate chain is validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

span.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , the digital signature is verified, the certificate chain is validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

param.span: The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.

span.span: The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.

summary.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message and, optionally, validates the certificate.

span.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message and, optionally, validates the certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método produce una excepción si se produce un error en la comprobación de la firma digital o no se cumplen los requisitos de validación.This method throws an exception if the verification of the digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. Si se requiere una validación más compleja, el llamador puede especificar que solo la firma se comprueba y, a continuación, utilizar un objeto que se va a realizar la validación personalizada.If more complex validation is required, the caller can specify that only the signature is verified and then use an object to perform custom validation.

span.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message by using the specified collection of certificates and, optionally, validates the certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método produce una excepción si se produce un error en la comprobación de la firma digital o no se cumplen los requisitos de validación.This method throws an exception if the verification of the digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. Si se requiere una validación más compleja, el llamador puede especificar que solo la firma se comprueba y, a continuación, utilizar un objeto que se va a realizar la validación personalizada.If more complex validation is required, the caller can specify that only the signature is verified and then use an object to perform custom validation.

summary.span: Creates a countersignature and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

span.span: Creates a countersignature and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ComputeCounterSignature() cil managed

summary.span: The method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a countersignature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

span.span: The method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a countersignature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

summary.span: Countersignatures are restricted to one level.

span.span: Countersignatures are restricted to one level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta implementación de CMS/PKCS #7 sólo admite un nivel de contrafirma.This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. Es decir, se puede firmar una firma, lo que constituye una contrafirma, pero ese contrafirma no se vuelve a estar firmada.That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. Este método muestra una interfaz de usuario en el que se elige los firmantes para este mensaje.This method displays a user interface in which you choose signers for this message. Esto requiere que el proceso actual se ejecuta *modo interactivo de usuario*, lo que significa que la propiedad está establecida en `true`.This requires that the current process is running in *user interactive mode*, meaning that the property is set to `true`. Normalmente, un proceso está en modo interactivo de usuario a menos que sea un proceso de servicio o se ejecute dentro de una aplicación Web.A process is normally in user interactive mode unless it is a service process or running inside a Web application. En la lista se mostrará los firmantes cuyos certificados cumplen las condiciones siguientes:Signers whose certificates meet the following conditions will be displayed in the list: - El certificado tiene una clave privada asociada.The certificate has an associated private key. - El certificado está dentro del período de validez.The certificate is within its validity period. - El certificado tiene ningún uso de claves o un uso de clave que admite firmas digitales o no rechazo.The certificate has no key usage or a key usage that supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation. Certificados de firmante se eligen en el almacén My.Signer certificates are chosen from the My store. ## Seguridad de .NET Framework.NET Framework Security Se requieren los permisos siguientes para mostrar la interfaz de usuario:The following permissions are required to display the user interface: - Se requieren los siguientes permisos para tener acceso a la clave de firma:The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - -

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta implementación de CMS/PKCS #7 sólo admite un nivel de contrafirma.This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. Es decir, se puede firmar una firma, lo que constituye una contrafirma, pero ese contrafirma no se vuelve a estar firmada.That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. ## Seguridad de .NET Framework.NET Framework Security Se requieren los siguientes permisos para tener acceso a la clave de firma:The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - -

summary.span: The property retrieves the set of counter signers associated with the signer information.

span.span: The property retrieves the set of counter signers associated with the signer information.

value.span: Un colección que representa los firmantes de contador para la información del firmante.

span.span: A collection that represents the counter signers for the signer information.

value.span: Si no hay ningún firmantes de contrafirma, la propiedad es una colección vacía.

span.span: If there are no counter signers, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta implementación de CMS/PKCS #7 sólo admite un nivel de contrafirma.This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. Es decir, se puede firmar una firma, lo que constituye una contrafirma, pero ese contrafirma no se vuelve a estar firmada.That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: The property retrieves the collection of signed attributes that is associated with the signer information.

span.span: The property retrieves the collection of signed attributes that is associated with the signer information.

summary.span: Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content.

span.span: Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content.

value.span: Un colección que representa los atributos firmados.

span.span: A collection that represents the signed attributes.

value.span: Si no hay ningún atributo firmado, la propiedad es una colección vacía.

span.span: If there are no signed attributes, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Un ejemplo de atributo firmado que podría incluirse en la recuperar la colección por el propiedad es el firma de atributos de tiempo.An example of a signed attribute that might be included in the collection retrieved by the property is the signing time attribute. Los atributos firmados se firman junto con el resto de la contenido del mensaje.Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content. Esto significa que una entidad que se comprueba correctamente la firma puede estar seguro de que el contenido de estos atributos es auténtico y no se han modificado.This means that a party that successfully verifies the signature can have confidence that the contents of these attributes are authentic and have not been altered. A objeto y un objeto se genera automáticamente y se coloca en el propiedad cada vez que la propiedad del firmante correspondiente no está vacía.A object and a object will be automatically generated and placed in the property whenever the property for the corresponding signer is not empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignerIdentifier As SubjectIdentifier

summary.span: The property retrieves the certificate identifier of the signer associated with the signer information.

span.span: The property retrieves the certificate identifier of the signer associated with the signer information.

value.span: Un objeto que identifica de forma única el certificado asociado a la información del firmante.

span.span: A object that uniquely identifies the certificate associated with the signer information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnsignedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: The property retrieves the collection of unsigned attributes that is associated with the content.

span.span: The property retrieves the collection of unsigned attributes that is associated with the content.

summary.span: Unsigned attributes can be modified without invalidating the signature.

span.span: Unsigned attributes can be modified without invalidating the signature.

value.span: Un colección que representa los atributos no firmados.

span.span: A collection that represents the unsigned attributes.

value.span: Si no hay ningún atributo sin signo, la propiedad es una colección vacía.

span.span: If there are no unsigned attributes, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Atributos no firmados no están firmados con el resto de la contenido del mensaje.Unsigned attributes are not signed along with the rest of the message content. Aunque una entidad comprueba correctamente la firma, los atributos no firmados se han modificado y no deberían considerarse autenticidad e integridad.Even though a party successfully verifies the signature, the unsigned attributes may have been altered and should not be considered to have authenticity or integrity. Un ejemplo de un atributo sin signo que puede incluirse en la recuperar la colección por el propiedad es una contrafirma.An example of an unsigned attribute that might be included in the collection retrieved by the property is a countersignature.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: The property retrieves the signer information version.

span.span: The property retrieves the signer information version.

value.span: Un valor entero que especifica la versión de información del firmante.

span.span: An int value that specifies the signer information version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks La versión determina si el mensaje es un mensaje PKCS #7 o un mensaje de sintaxis de mensajes criptográficos (CMS).The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message. CMS es un superconjunto nuevo de PKCS #7.CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
